content.text: is designed to retrieve extended billing information for accounts based on various criteria such as agency code, billing period, and facility number. It handles different energy sources (electric, gas, steam) and adjusts the data retrieval based on whether the user is an agency user or not. The procedure logs its usage and performs complex data aggregation and filtering to return detailed billing information.
The complexity of this stored procedure is high due to the following reasons:
It involves multiple conditional logic paths based on input parameters.
It uses Common Table Expressions (CTEs) for data aggregation.
It performs multiple UNION ALL operations to combine results from different billing adjustment tables.
It involves dynamic decision-making based on agency or facility data.
It interacts with several tables and views, indicating a complex data model.
: The email address of the user requesting the report, used for logging purposes.
: The billing period for which data is requested.
: The code of the agency for which billing information is requested.
: The facility number used to filter data.
: A flag indicating whether the user is an agency user, affecting how data is retrieved.
: The procedure begins by setting the transaction isolation level to READ UNCOMMITTED to avoid locking issues and declares a variable to store the procedure name for logging.
: If the user is an agency user, the current processing period is retrieved and used as the billing period.
: The procedure logs its execution details using the
Converts the facility number to a sequence ID.
Determines whether to return data by agency or facility based on the presence of a facility sequence ID.
Uses a CTE to aggregate electric billing adjustment data.
Inserts agency and descendant data into a table variable if data is to be returned by agency.
Retrieves and combines data from multiple billing adjustment tables (electric, gas, steam) using UNION ALL.
Filters data based on agency or facility, billing period, and energy source.
Ensures only current accounts are considered by checking account numbers.
: This level reduces locking overhead but may lead to dirty reads.
: The use of multiple joins and aggregations can be resource-intensive, especially with large datasets.
: Combining multiple result sets can be costly in terms of performance.
: While table variables are useful, they may not perform well with large datasets compared to temporary tables.
: The use of READ UNCOMMITTED may lead to inconsistent data being read if there are concurrent updates.
: The complexity and number of joins may impact performance as data volume grows.
: The procedure lacks explicit error handling, which could lead to unhandled exceptions.
: There is no validation of input parameters, which could lead to unexpected behavior if invalid data is provided.
: High concurrency could lead to performance degradation due to the extensive use of joins and aggregations.

CREATE PROCEDURE [Report].[usp_Published_GetAccountExtentedBillingInformationByAgencyCode_Updated]
(
	@EmailAddress AS VARCHAR(75)
	,@PublishedBillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(6)
	,@AgencyCode AS VARCHAR(6)
	,@OECFacilityNumber AS VARCHAR(7)
	,@IsAgencyUser BIT = 0
)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

	DECLARE @spname VARCHAR(100) = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID);

	IF (@IsAgencyUser = 1)
	BEGIN
		SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod = PublishedBillingPeriod FROM Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame WHERE CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y';
	END;

	EXEC [Audit].usp_AddReportUsageLog @ReportName = @spname
		,@StoredProcName = @spname
		,@RequestedBy = @EmailAddress
		,@prmPublishedBillingPeriod	= @PublishedBillingPeriod
		,@prmBillingPeriod = NULL
		,@prmAgency_ies = @AgencyCode
		,@prmFacilityNumber_s = @OECFacilityNumber
		,@prmStartingBillingPeriod = NULL
		,@prmEndingBillingPeriod = NULL;
	
	DECLARE @FacilitySeqid AS INT, @ResultByAgency AS CHAR(1);
		
	-- convert the facility number to seqid
	SELECT @FacilitySeqid = FacilitySeqid FROM Billing.Facility WHERE OecFacilityNumber = @OECFacilityNumber;	
	
	-- determine if we need to return data by agency or simply for the single facility
	SELECT @ResultByAgency = CASE WHEN @FacilitySeqid IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END;

	-- collect the agencies into a table variable to save a bit
	DECLARE @AgencyAndItsDecendants TABLE(AgencyDivisionSeqID INT);

	IF(@ResultByAgency = 'Y')
	BEGIN
		-- populate the table
		INSERT INTO @AgencyAndItsDecendants (AgencyDivisionSeqID)
		SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID
		FROM Billing.uftn_TableGetAllAgencyChildrenByAgencyCodeOEC(@AgencyCode, @EmailAddress);
	END;
	-- return a view of the AccountBillingAdjutmentElectric data
	
	-- the Electric Block
		
	-- Define the CTE expression name and column list.
	WITH ABAE_TOD_Usage_CTE (ABAESeqid
		,BillingPeriod
		,BillingPeriodRevision
		,ConsumtionOnPeak
		,ConsumtionOffPeak
		,CancelConsumtionOnPeak
		,CancelConsumtionOffPeak)
	AS(SELECT AB.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectricSeqid AS ABSeqid
			,AB.BillingPeriod
			,AB.BillingPeriodRevision
			,SUM(MBAE.Consumption) AS ConsumtionOnPeak
			,SUM(MBAE.ConsumptionHoursOffPeak) AS ConsumtionOffPeak
			,SUM(MBAE.CancelConsumption) AS CancelConsumtionOnPeak
			,SUM(MBAE.CancelConsumptionHoursOffPeak) AS CancelConsumtionOffPeak
		FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric AS AB
			INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON AB.AdjustedAccount = A.AccountSeqid
			INNER JOIN Billing.AccountExchangeMeterTrack AS AEMT ON A.AccountSeqid = AEMT.OriginalAccountSeqid
			INNER JOIN Billing.Meter AS M ON AEMT.OriginalMeterSeqid = M.MeterSeqid
			INNER JOIN Billing.MeterBillingAdjustmentElectric AS MBAE ON M.MeterSeqid = MBAE.MeterBilled
				AND AB.BillingPeriod = MBAE.BillingPeriod AND AB.BillingPeriodRevision = MBAE.BillingPeriodRevision
		WHERE AB.IsTimeOfDayAccount = 'Y' AND MBAE.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod
			AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR A.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
			AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR A.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		GROUP BY AB.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectricSeqid, AB.BillingPeriod, AB.BillingPeriodRevision)

	SELECT CA.UniqueAccountSeqid AS AccountSeqid
		,CA.CurrentAccountNumber
		,A.EnergySource
		,AB.BillingPeriod
		,AB.BillingPeriodRevision
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount AS OriginalBilledAmount
		,T.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,T.TotalAmountDue AS TotalAmountDue
		,CASE WHEN CTE.ABAESeqid IS NULL THEN AB.AccountEnergyUsage ELSE CTE.ConsumtionOnPeak END AS AccountOnPeakKWH
		,CASE WHEN CTE.ABAESeqid IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CTE.ConsumtionOffPeak END AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,AB.AccountDemandUsage AS AccountDemandKW
		,AB.AccountReactivePowerEnergy AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,AB.CommodityConsumption + AB.CommodityConsumptionOffPeak
			+ AB.CommodityConsumptionShoulder AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,AB.CommodityDemand + AB.CommodityDemandOffPeak + AB.CommodityDemandShoulder
			+ AB.MinimumBilledDemandDollars AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,AB.EnergyCostAdjustment AS ProductionECACharges
		,AB.DeliveryChargeAmount
		,AB.DeliveryConsumption
		,AB.DeliveryDemand + AB.DeliveryMinimumBilledAmount AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,AB.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,AB.CommodityAllocationCharge AS FixedCharges
		,AB.GrossReceiptTax
		,AB.RevisedReactivePowerDollars
		,AB.MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,AB.DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand
		,AB.ProductionMisc1 AS ZECsCharge
		--Cancel Block
		,AB.ProductionMisc1 AS OriginalZECsCharge
		,CASE WHEN CTE.ABAESeqid IS NULL THEN (-1) * AB.CancelAccountEnergyUsage
			ELSE (-1) * CTE.CancelConsumtionOnPeak END AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW
		,CASE WHEN CTE.ABAESeqid IS NULL THEN 0
			ELSE (-1) * CTE.CancelConsumtionOffPeak END AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,(-1) * AB.CancelAccountDemandUsage AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,(-1) * AB.CanceledAccountReactivePowerEnergy AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,(-1) * AB.CancelCommodityConsumption + (-1) * AB.CancelCommodityConsumptionOffPeak + (-1)
			* AB.CancelCommodityConsumptionShoulder AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,(-1) * AB.CancelCommodityDemand + (-1) * AB.CancelCommodityDemandOffPeak + (-1)
			* AB.cancelCommodityDemandShoulder + (-1)
			* AB.CancelMinimumBilledDemandDollars AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,(-1) * AB.CancelEnergyCostAdjustment AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,(-1) * AB.CancelDeliveryChargeAmount AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,(-1) * AB.CancelDeliveryConsumption AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,(-1) * AB.CancelDeliveryDemand + (1) * AB.CancelDeliveryMinimumBilledAmount AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,AB.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,AB.CommodityAllocationCharge AS OriginalFixedCharges
		,(-1) * AB.CancelGrossReceiptTax AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,(-1) * AB.OriginalReactivePowerDollars AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars
		-- steam block here
		,NULL AS RevisedMLBS
		,NULL AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,NULL AS RevisedCCF
		,NULL AS OriginalCCF
		,NULL AS RevisedTherms
		,NULL AS OriginalTherms
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric AS AB
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON AB.AdjustedAccount = A.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS CA ON A.CurrentAccountNumber = CA.CurrentAccountNumber
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS T ON T.AccountSeqid = CA.AccountSeqid
		LEFT OUTER JOIN ABAE_TOD_Usage_CTE AS CTE ON AB.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectricSeqid = CTE.ABAESeqid
	WHERE (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR CA.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR CA.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		AND AB.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND CA.CurrentAccountNumber = CA.OriginalAccountNumber -- filters just the current accounts
		AND T.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND T.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND AB.BillingPeriodRevision = T.BillingPeriod
	UNION ALL
	-- the GAS block
	SELECT A.UniqueAccountSeqid AS AccountSeqid
		,A.CurrentAccountNumber
		,A.EnergySource
		,ABAG.BillingPeriod
		,ABAG.BillingPeriodRevision
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount
		,T.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,T.TotalAmountDue
		--electric Block
		,NULL AS AccountOnPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,T.RevisedBilledAmount AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS DeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS DeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS FixedCharges
		,NULL AS GrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS RevisedReactivePowerDollars
		,NULL AS MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,NULL AS DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand
		,NULL AS ZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalFixedCharges
		,NULL AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars
		-- steam block here
		,NULL AS RevisedMLBS
		,NULL AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,RevisedCCF AS RevisedCCF
		,ABAG.CanceledCCF AS OriginalCCF
		,RevisedTherms AS RevisedTherms
		,ABAG.CanceledTherms AS OriginalTherms
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentGas AS ABAG
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABAG.UniqueAccountSeqId = A.UniqueAccountSeqId
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS T ON T.UniqueAccountSeqid = A.UniqueAccountSeqid
	WHERE ((@ResultByAgency = 'Y' AND A.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		OR (@ResultByAgency = 'N' AND A.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid))
		AND ABAG.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND A.CurrentAccountNumber = A.OriginalAccountNumber -- filters just the current accounts
		AND T.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND T.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND ABAG.BillingPeriodRevision = T.BillingPeriod
		AND A.EnergySource = 5
	UNION ALL
	-- the CRIS GAS block
	SELECT A.UniqueAccountSeqid AS AccountSeqid
		,A.CurrentAccountNumber
		,A.EnergySource
		,ABACG.BillingPeriod
		,ABACG.BillingPeriodRevision
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount
		,T.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,T.TotalAmountDue
		--electric Block
		,NULL AS AccountOnPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,T.RevisedBilledAmount AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS DeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS DeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS FixedCharges
		,NULL AS GrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS RevisedReactivePowerDollars
		,NULL AS MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,NULL AS DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand
		,NULL AS ZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS OrignalFixedCharges
		,NULL AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars
		-- steam block here
		,NULL AS RevisedMLBS
		,NULL AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,RevisedCCF AS RevisedCCF
		,ABACG.CancelCCF AS OriginalCCF
		,RevisedTherms AS RevisedTherms
		,ABACG.CancelTherms AS OriginalTherms
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas AS ABACG
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABACG.UniqueAccountSeqId = A.UniqueAccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS T ON T.UniqueAccountSeqid = A.UniqueAccountSeqid
	WHERE (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR A.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR A.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		AND ABACG.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND A.CurrentAccountNumber = A.OriginalAccountNumber -- filters just the current accounts
		AND T.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND T.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND ABACG.BillingPeriodRevision = T.BillingPeriod
	UNION ALL
	-- the manual billing STEAM block
	SELECT A.UniqueAccountSeqid AS AccountSeqid
		,A.CurrentAccountNumber
		,A.EnergySource
		,ABAPB.BillingPeriod
		,ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount
		,T.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,T.TotalAmountDue
		--electric Block
		,NULL AS AccountOnPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,T.RevisedBilledAmount AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS DeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS DeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS FixedCharges
		,NULL AS GrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS RevisedReactivePowerDollars
		,NULL AS MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,NULL AS DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand
		,NULL AS ZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalFixedCharges
		,NULL AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars
		-- steam starts here
		,ABAPB.RevisedEnergy AS RevisedMLBS
		,ABAPB.CanceledEnergy AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,NULL AS RevisedCCF
		,NULL AS OriginalCCF
		,NULL AS RevisedTherms
		,NULL AS OriginalTherms
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill AS ABAPB
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABAPB.UniqueAccountSeqId = A.UniqueAccountSeqId
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS T ON T.UniqueAccountSeqid = A.UniqueAccountSeqid
	WHERE (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR A.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR A.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		AND ABAPB.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND A.CurrentAccountNumber = A.OriginalAccountNumber -- filters just the current accounts
		AND T.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND T.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision = T.BillingPeriod
		AND A.EnergySource = 6
	UNION ALL
	-- the manual billing ELECTRIC block
	SELECT CA.UniqueAccountSeqid AS AccountSeqid
		,CA.CurrentAccountNumber
		,1 AS EnergySource
		,ABAPB.BillingPeriod
		,ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount
		,T.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,T.TotalAmountDue
		--electric Block
		,ABAPB.RevisedEnergy AS AccountOnPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,ABAPB.RevisedDemand AS AccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,T.RevisedBilledAmount AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS DeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS DeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS FixedCharges
		,NULL AS GrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS RevisedReactivePowerDollars
		,NULL AS MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,NULL AS DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand
		,NULL AS ZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalZECsCharge
		,ISNULL(ABAPB.CanceledEnergy, 0) AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,ISNULL(ABAPB.CanceledDemand, 0) AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalFixedCharges
		,NULL AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars
		-- steam starts here
		,NULL AS RevisedMLBS
		,NULL AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,NULL AS RevisedCCF
		,NULL AS OriginalCCF
		,NULL AS RevisedTherms
		,NULL AS OriginalTherms
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill AS ABAPB
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABAPB.AccountSeqid = A.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS CA ON A.CurrentAccountNumber = CA.CurrentAccountNumber
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS T ON T.AccountSeqid = CA.AccountSeqid
	WHERE (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR CA.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR CA.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		AND ABAPB.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND CA.CurrentAccountNumber = CA.OriginalAccountNumber -- filters just the current accounts
		AND T.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND T.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision = T.BillingPeriod
		AND CA.EnergySource IN (1,2,3,4) -- all electric
	UNION ALL
	-- the manual billing GAS block
	SELECT A.UniqueAccountSeqid AS AccountSeqid
		,A.CurrentAccountNumber
		,A.EnergySource
		,ABAPB.BillingPeriod
		,ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount
		,T.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,T.TotalAmountDue
		--electric Block
		,NULL AS AccountOnPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,T.RevisedBilledAmount AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS DeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS DeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS FixedCharges
		,NULL AS GrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS RevisedReactivePowerDollars
		,NULL AS MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,NULL AS DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand
		,NULL AS ZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalFixedCharges
		,NULL AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars
		-- steam starts here
		,NULL AS RevisedMLBS
		,NULL AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,ABAPB.RevisedCCF AS RevisedCCF
		,ABAPB.CanceledCCF AS OriginalCCF
		,ABAPB.RevisedEnergy AS RevisedTherms
		,ABAPB.CanceledEnergy AS OriginalTherms
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill AS ABAPB
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABAPB.UniqueAccountSeqId = A.UniqueAccountSeqId
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS T ON T.UniqueAccountSeqid = A.UniqueAccountSeqid
	WHERE (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR A.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR A.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		AND ABAPB.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND A.CurrentAccountNumber = A.OriginalAccountNumber -- filters just the current accounts
		AND T.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND T.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision = T.BillingPeriod
		AND A.EnergySource = 5 -- gas only
	UNION ALL
	-- CONED GAS STEAM
	SELECT CA.UniqueAccountSeqid AS AccountSeqid
		,CA.CurrentAccountNumber
		,A.EnergySource
		,ABACES.BillingPeriod
		,ABACES.BillingPeriodRevision
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount
		,T.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,T.TotalAmountDue
		--electric Block
		,NULL AS AccountOnPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,T.RevisedBilledAmount AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS DeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS DeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS FixedCharges
		,NULL AS GrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS RevisedReactivePowerDollars
		,NULL AS MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,NULL AS DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand
		,NULL AS ZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,T.OriginalBilledAmount AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalFixedCharges
		,NULL AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars
		-- steam starts here
		,CASE WHEN  ABACES.TransactionType='BI' THEN ABACES.Consumption END AS RevisedMLBS
		,CASE WHEN  ABACES.TransactionType='BC' THEN ABACES.Consumption END AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,NULL AS RevisedCCF
		,NULL AS OriginalCCF
		,NULL AS RevisedTherms
		,NULL AS OriginalTherms
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentConEdSteam AS ABACES
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABACES.AccountSeqid = A.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS CA ON A.CurrentAccountNumber = CA.CurrentAccountNumber
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS T ON T.UniqueAccountSeqid = CA.UniqueAccountSeqid
	WHERE (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR CA.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR CA.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		AND ABACES.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND CA.CurrentAccountNumber = CA.OriginalAccountNumber -- filters just the current accounts
		AND T.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND T.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
		AND ABACES.BillingPeriodRevision = T.BillingPeriod
		AND CA.EnergySource = 6;
END;
